thread.title: Emmaus field hockey team tops Whitehall
thread.title_full: Emmaus field hockey team tops Whitehall

title: Emmaus field hockey team tops Whitehall
text:
Complete Box Score Â» 
Emmaus 3, Whitehall 0 -- Rapid recap 
The Emmaus High School field hockey team faced one of its better challenges of the season Tuesday night before posting a 3-0 Eastern Pennsylvania Conference victory over visiting Whitehall. 
Turning point : With Emmaus leading 1-0 and Whitehall having the momentum, Madison Orobono and Kayla Kisthardt scored 29 seconds apart to give the Green Hornets a 3-0 lead with 19:55 left in the game. 
Top performer : Emmaus junior midfielder Meredith Sholder didn't score for the first time this season but registered all three assists and essentially controlled the flow of the game. 
What it means : Emmaus showed once again that it's the top team in the area and one of the best in the state. Whitehall hung around long enough and played well enough to indicate it's every bit as good as its record and could be a threat in the Eastern Pennsylvania Conference and District 11 playoffs.
